q_en: What products are included in James's order?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'James';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "James"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '4';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for orders placed by the customer "James"

steps.sql: SELECT product_id, number FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN ('4', '12');
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs and quantities for the products included in the orders of the customer "James"

steps.sql: SELECT p.id, pt.description, p.attributes FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN ('22', '26', '14', '6', '7');
steps.description: Retrieve the product details including type and attributes for the products in the orders of the customer "James"

response:
Hey there! üòÑ Let's take a look at what products are included in James's order. Here's a neat table with all the details:

| Product ID | Description | Attributes       | Quantity |
|------------|-------------|------------------|----------|
| 22         | Jacket      | Brown, S size    | 185      |
| 26         | Coat        | Red, M size      | 200      |
| 14         | Jacket      | Yellow, L size   | 175      |
| 6          | Jacket      | Brown, L size    | 200      |
| 7          | Skirt       | Purple, M size   | 330      |

James has quite a stylish selection, don't you think? üß•üëó If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!
